2025-01-01 * "Opening Balance"
  Assets:Bank 10000 CHF

2025-01-05 * "Transfer"
  Assets:Bank -5000 CHF
  Assets:Trading 5000 CHF

2025-01-05 * "Trade"
  Assets:Trading 25 VT { 100 CHF, 2025-01-05 }
  Assets:Trading -2500 CHF

2025-01-25 * "Salary"
  ! Assets:Bank 5000 CHF

2025-01-25 ! "Rent"
  Assets:Bank -1250 CHF
